title: October Moon
description: Mandi just moved into an old farmhouse in the middle of nowhere. Having given up hope of having a social life in the sleepy, strange town, Mandi is overjoyed when she meets Sarah. She's beautiful, funny, and has an great sense of fashion - and she also just happens to be a witch. Drawn into the world of witchcraft, Mandi soon realizes the stakes are much higher than she ever could have imagined.
author: Ralee Rowan
